name: v1.11.0
body: ## 1.11.0 (2016-10-06) #### Features - add support for customisable signal ([2cd85b1f](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/2cd85b1f))

name: v1.10.2
body: ### 1.10.2 (2016-08-18) #### Bug Fixes - revert 'inherit' on stdin ([be5d4e8d](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/be5d4e8d), closes [#894](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/894), [#895](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/895))

name: v1.10.1
body: ### 1.10.1 (2016-08-18) #### Bug Fixes - use stdin=inhert on vanilla run ([58a236e0](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/58a236e0), closes [#890](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/890))

name: v1.10.0
body: ## 1.10.0 (2016-07-25) #### Features - support --config command line arg ([ee110add](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/ee110add), closes [#755](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/755), [#855](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/855))

name: v1.9.2
body: ### 1.9.2 (2016-04-29) #### Bug Fixes - **stdin:** don't watch for 'rs' when --no-stdin is provided ([bded0ac5](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/bded0ac5))

name: v1.9.1
body: ### 1.9.1 (2016-02-25) #### Bug Fixes - don't concatenate ignore regexes ([7152585f](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/7152585f)) - update regex to include unicode extensions -- no tests yet cc: @remy ([1addfea8](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/1addfea8))

name: v1.9.0
body: ## 1.9.0 (2016-02-19) #### Features - support --polling-interval command line arg ([fc2bc168](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/fc2bc168))

name: v1.8.1
body: ### 1.8.1 (2015-11-02) #### Bug Fixes - watch js, json files by default ([3480f37a](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/3480f37a), closes [#710](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/710))

name: v1.8.0
body: ## 1.8.0 (2015-10-25) #### Bug Fixes - JSON extension not watched when "scriptExt" is defined ([4c195df5](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/4c195df5), closes [#643](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/643)) - restart on new files added to watched dir ([e4412268](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/e4412268), closes [#664](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/664)) - bump ps-tree dependency ([ef916f62](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/ef916f62)) - dep bumps ([3eea9ec6](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/3eea9ec6)) - `rs` to restart ([8a0ce094](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/8a0ce094), closes [#648](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/648)) - allows user to not watch ([a3b6c3ec](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/a3b6c3ec), closes [#516](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/516)) - make control over ignoreRoot easier ([526811d9](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/526811d9)) - stdin was closed after crashed child ([29cf71e9](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/29cf71e9), closes [#601](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/601)) #### Features - add JSON to default watched extensions ([370d778d](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/370d778d), closes [#643](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/643))

name: v1.7.3
body: ### 1.7.3 (2015-10-20) #### Bug Fixes - JSON extension not watched outside of coffeescript ([ceb1515e](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/ceb1515e), closes [#643](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/643))

name: v1.7.2
body: ### 1.7.2 (2015-10-19) #### Bug Fixes - restart on new files added to watched dir ([2f19ffb5](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/2f19ffb5), closes [#664](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/664)) - bump ps-tree dependency ([880fa52a](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/880fa52a)) - dep bumps ([d68a2fcd](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/d68a2fcd))

name: v1.7.1
body: ### 1.7.1 (2015-09-25) #### Bug Fixes - `rs` to restart ([931d5005](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/931d5005), closes [#648](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/648))

name: v1.7.0
body: ## 1.7.0 (2015-09-21) #### Bug Fixes - allows user to not watch ([6a5397e1](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/6a5397e1), closes [#516](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/516)) - make control over ignoreRoot easier ([8af4b4bc](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/8af4b4bc)) #### Features - add JSON to default watched extensions ([cd4201af](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/cd4201af), closes [#643](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/643))

name: v1.6.1
body: ### 1.6.1 (2015-09-19) #### Bug Fixes - stdin was closed after crashed child ([d817866e](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/d817866e), closes [#601](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/601))

name: v1.6.0
body: ## 1.6.0 (2015-09-19) #### Bug Fixes - restore --legacy-watch ([489f22dc](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/489f22dc), closes [#639](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/639), [#633](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/633)) - supporting env values in package.start ([5e07bfef](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/5e07bfef), closes [#621](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/621), [#615](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/615), [#577](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/577), [#513](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/issues/513)) #### Features - support disabling colour output ([6e40e9ad](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/6e40e9ad))

name: v1.5.1
body: ### 1.5.1 (2015-09-16) #### Bug Fixes - ignore dotfiles only if not explicitly told to do so ([4826c877](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/4826c877))

name: v1.5.0
body: ## 1.5.0 (2015-09-12) #### Bug Fixes - restore file count in verbose mode ([7250919e](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/7250919e)) #### Features - merge ignore rules with defaults ([15b0b88d](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/15b0b88d))

name: v1.4.2
body: ### 1.4.2 (2015-09-12) #### Refactor - Move to using Chokidar library for all file watching - closes many issues #### Bug Fixes - protect from missing options ([ebbe1edb](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/ebbe1edb)) - incorrectly exiting when required ([7496f083](https://github.com/remy/nodemon/commit/7496f083))
